chair.name: 'Chair'
chair.text: Original idea was to create photorealistic simple chair, but as most other projects it grew a bit into small research in node texture experimentation that is present in Blender software.

blocks.text: The chair and nearby objects should invoke certain comfiness and small desire to sit, relax and sip some of the tea.
Design wise it may confuse viewer as the design of table and chair varies, former is of feeling simple grandmotherly tea set, the latter of mid-tier level of design pompousness.
